JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Temps for warehouse work in Vejle
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job nr. 171211

Are you a student and able to work a few days per week or can you work every day and looking for full time? Then we might have a great opportunity for you.

Are you a student and able to work a few days per week, or can you work every day and looking for full time? Then we might have a great opportunity for you.

The position is in Salling Group in Vejle and you will be working in a cold warehouse, where the temperature is 2 degrees celsius.

The job will be at one of the largest retailers in Denmark. They employ around 50.000 people and have several times been elected the most diverse workplace in Denmark.

Working in the warehouse your tasks will be picking and packing orders for supermarkets.

About you

  • Can communicate in English.
  • Are openminded and have a positive attitude.
  • Pay attention to details.
  • Are flexible regarding working hours.

Practical info

Working hours:

  • Morning shift: 06:00-14:15
  • Evening shift: 14:15-22:00 or from 16:00-22:00

Salary is according to union agreements (125,93 kr/hour)

It is an advantage if you live in or in the vicinity of Vejle.

If you have any questions, mail us at: team-vejle@moment.dk.
